Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: I think that after sending membership request and before exiting the go routine which makes connection we can wait for corresponding membership response with timeout. And in cases timeout expires before we getting the response retry again. If we can pull this off, it'll be great! > Additionally I think that retry logic should be exponential backoff strategy to increase the probability of getting connected in case of the network partition. Agreed. >
